reviewText: This is an incredibly useful tool for schools or working artists from two extremely talented and experienced theatre professionals.

light and paint, and how they work together, are not just explained, but demonstrated in clear detail with brilliant examples.  while this lecture was designed for theater work, understanding of these basic principals is essential for designers, visual artists,  interior decorators, decorative painters, as well as scenic artists.  chapters are laid out well for easy reference.  a great tool to have in your design library.
